title: The number of each floor shall be conspicuously painted in figures at least 15cm
clause_text: The number of each floor shall be conspicuously painted in figures at least 15cm. large on the wall opposite the lift/lifts opening or on other suitable surface so as to be distinctly visible from the lift cage.
